import math

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a.sort(reverse=True)
low = a[0]
high = sum(a)
while low < high:
	mid = (low + high) // 2
	t = 0
	i = 0
	while i < n and t < mid:
		if t >= a[i]:
			t = mid
			break
		t += (mid - a[i])
		i += 1
	if t >= mid:
		high = mid
	else:
		low = mid + 1
print(high)
